import React from "react"; import projects from "../projectData"; import Zoom from "react-reveal/Zoom"; import github from "./images/icons/github.svg"; import website from "./images/icons/external-link.svg"; const Project = () => { return ( <>

Projects

{projects.map((project, index) => (

{project.title}

{project.description}

{project.tools.map((disc, index) => ( {disc} ))}
))}
{/* See more on Github */}
); }; export default Project;
